Package logicLayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DanielsPostHus
    Has different methods for sending emails
    DrawCarportAngleSide
    Draws a carport with raised roof seen from the side in SVG
    DrawCarportAngleTop
    Draws a carport with raised roof seen from above in SVG
    DrawCarportFlatSide
    Draws a carport with flat roof seen from the side in SVG
    DrawCarportFlatTop
    Draws a carport with flat roof seen from above in SVG
    Employee
    Employee class containing needed information of set employee
    FlatCarPortList
    This class calculates the parts list for a carport with a flat roof.
    Log
    Logs when and where an exception occurred and saves in "/home/daniel/carportlogs/sql.log"
    LogicFacade
    A facade between the presentaitionLayer and logicLayer
    Material
    A material can be different things, such as a plank, a tool, a screw etc. it contains the needed information of that specific item.
    Order
    An order includes everything about a specific Order It has the partlist, contact information, the drawings, and the general order information like status, price, date of order etc.
    PartLine  
    Roof
    A roof has information about a specific roof. id, name, type.
    SVG
    This class is used to build SVGS. this is done by first instantiating a new object of the class, and then adding different elements to that object.
    TallCarPortList
    This class calculates the parts list for a carport with a raised roof.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CustomException
    Thrown whenever we catch another exception.
    NoAccessException
    Used when a user is trying to access something they are not allowed to.
